title: Fix blank draft tab display issue

requirements.summary: Diagnose and fix the issue causing the draft tab to display a completely blank white page instead of showing the application content
acceptanceCriteria: The draft tab loads and displays the complete landing page with all sections visible
All components (navigation, hero section, services, booking form, footer) render correctly
No console errors preventing page load
All three language options (Gujarati, Hindi, English) work properly

file_operations.description: Add error boundary and console error logging to catch and display any React rendering errors that might be causing the blank page. Verify that QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider are properly configured and not throwing silent errors during initialization.

Add error handling and fallback UI to catch any errors from LandingPage component. Add console logging to verify the component is mounting. Ensure the component returns valid JSX and is not returning null or undefined.

Add error boundaries around each section component and verify all child components are properly imported and rendered. Check that LanguageProvider context is available and not causing render failures. Add defensive checks for translation data access.

Verify the root div with id 'root' exists and is not being hidden by CSS. Add inline fallback content inside the root div that displays if React fails to mount, helping diagnose whether the issue is React-related or HTML-related.

requirements.summary: Verify all React components are properly exported and imported in the component tree
acceptanceCriteria: LandingPage component successfully renders all child sections
No missing component imports causing render failures
App.tsx correctly mounts the root component

file_operations.description: Verify all section imports (LandingNav, HeroSection, ServicesSection, WaterJetFoamSection, SofaCleaningSection, OurWorkSection, CoverageSection, LocalSeoPhrasesSection, ServiceAreasSection, BookingSection, LandingFooter, FloatingWhatsAppButton) are using correct paths and exported properly. Add import validation checks.
Verify component exports as default and check that all imports (useTranslation hook, IconBadge component) are correctly resolved. Ensure the component returns valid JSX with no syntax errors.
Verify component exports correctly and all dependencies (translations, IconBadge) are properly imported and accessible. Check for any runtime errors in mapping service data.
Verify component exports and check that form state management and WhatsApp link generation logic don't contain errors that could break rendering.
Add error handling for localStorage access failures and ensure the provider always returns valid context values. Verify translations object is properly imported and accessible.

requirements.summary: Ensure all required assets (fonts, images, audio files) are properly loaded and accessible
acceptanceCriteria: Google Fonts for Gujarati/Hindi load successfully
Background images in hero section render correctly
Icon sound effects file loads without errors
All Font Awesome icons display properly

file_operations.description: Verify Google Fonts links for Noto Sans Gujarati and Noto Sans Devanagari are correct and loading. Check that Font Awesome CDN link is valid and not blocked. Add error handlers for font loading failures.

Verify background image path references and ensure they resolve correctly. Check that gradient overlays and decorative blob elements are not causing layout issues. Ensure any missing images degrade gracefully without breaking the page.
Verify audio file path is correct and add better error handling for cases where the audio file fails to load. Ensure audio loading failures don't prevent component rendering.
Verify Font Awesome icon class names are correct and add fallback rendering if icons fail to load. Ensure the sound effect hook integration doesn't cause component failures.

requirements.summary: Validate that all styling and Tailwind CSS classes are correctly applied and not causing layout issues
acceptanceCriteria: Responsive grid layouts function on different screen sizes
No CSS conflicts causing invisible content

file_operations.description: Verify Tailwind directives are properly configured and CSS custom properties are defined correctly. Check that glassmorphism utility classes are not causing rendering issues. Ensure no CSS is hiding the root element or entire page.
Verify Tailwind configuration is valid and all custom colors, fonts, and utilities are properly defined. Check that the configuration doesn't contain syntax errors that could prevent CSS generation.

Verify gradient background classes are valid Tailwind classes and not causing layout issues. Check that the min-h-screen and flex layout don't hide content. Ensure glassmorphism classes are properly defined in the CSS.
Verify sticky positioning and glass panel styling don't interfere with content visibility. Check z-index values don't cause layering issues that hide page content.
